Description: Create an EC2 t2.micro instance with setup commands

EC2KeyPair.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to SSH into the instance

Fn::Base64.Fn::Sub:
#!/bin/bash
 yum update -y
 yum install -y java-11 wget tar python3-pip
 cd /home/ec2-user
 wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/kafka/2.8.1/kafka_2.12-2.8.1.tgz
 tar -xzf kafka_2.12-2.8.1.tgz
 chown -R ec2-user:ec2-user kafka_2.12-2.8.1
 chmod +x kafka_2.12-2.8.1/bin/*.sh
 cd /home/ec2-user/kafka_2.12-2.8.1/libs/
 wget https://github.com/aws/aws-msk-iam-auth/releases/download/v2.3.0/aws-msk-iam-auth-2.3.0-all.jar
 cd /home/ec2-user/kafka_2.12-2.8.1/bin/
 cat <<EOT > client.properties
 security.protocol=SASL_SSL
 sasl.mechanism=AWS_MSK_IAM
 sasl.jaas.config=software.amazon.msk.auth.iam.IAMLoginModule required
 sasl.client.callback.handler.class=software.amazon.msk.auth.iam.IAMClientCallbackHandler
 EOT
 export CLASSPATH=/home/ec2-user/kafka_2.12-2.8.1/libs/aws-msk-iam-auth-2.3.0-all.jar
 pip3 install kafka-python aws-msk-iam-sasl-signer-python

InstancePublicIP.Description: Public IP of the EC2 instance

InstancePublicDNS.Description: Public DNS of the EC2 instance
